item.title: Bowes Road near Betstyle Circus is filthy, 20th December
item.description:

item.title: Lime bikes legal dumping no regard. Get them off our street, 20th December
item.description:
Bikes dumped. No care, no care for law, littering making a nice street a mess. Going to get worse tonight will update… as I am the only one measuring this can Lime pay me a wage… or just get off the street. Amateurs.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 54-56, Great Eastern Street, Shoreditch, Greater London

item.title: Rats, 20th December
